name: NSA Venture
overview:
NSA Ventures (Nyskopunarsjodur atvinnulifsins) invests directly in Icelandic seed and start-up companies with high growth potential to an international scale.

Founded in 1998, NSA Ventures is an evergreen fund that has invested in over 145 companies since its inception. Currently the fund has a portfolio of 38 companies. The majority of the fund’s direct investments are in Technology and the Life Sciences.

Through a fund investment arm NSA Ventures is currently invested in the 3 other Icelandic venture funds.

NSA Ventures is a member of EVCA , BVCA and the Nordic Venture Network.
